label: 看板
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: abbreviation for kanban bōeki, lit.: signboard trade, a system of trading goods. The word is used by Kaempfer for the sales of foreign goods. [看板貿易]
